snippet.title: Cozy Keep Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2261350/Medieval_Shop_Simulator/

Build, decorate and run your own medieval shop set in a fantasy world. Explore, hunt and gather resources, build crafting stations and unlock new items and weapons which can be sold for maximum profit. Pay off your debt to the king and make your father proud by owning the best shop in the region.

Battle Of The Creek by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
